Uses of Interface
net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.event.ComponentListener

  • Packages that use ComponentListener 
    Package Description
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt
    MIWT is a web toolkit for rapidly building user interfaces.
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component
    This package is for primitive components.
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.composite
    This package is for composite components which are components that are built from other components.
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.event
    Events specific to components live here.
    net.proteusframework.ui.workspace
    The workspace API provides a framework for managing UIs based on tasks and events.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WindowManager
      The WindowManager manages the presentation, medium and event dispatch layers for one session of any number of MIWT applications.
